sentences.english: Opening ceremony of the 2011 Summer Camp at the Guangxi - Great Hall of the People.
sentences.chinese: 在南宁市的广西人民大会堂举行开营仪式。

sentences.english: Immediately, Sumou was sent to Nanning Red Cross Hospital for treatment.
sentences.chinese: 随即，苏某被送到南宁市红十字会医院进行救治。

sentences.english: There are many well-grown native flora on campus.
sentences.chinese: 南宁市高校校园内较多地使用乡土树种，长势良好。

sentences.english: This paper introduces the business users' gas engineering design experience in Nanning City.
sentences.chinese: 文章介绍了南宁市商业用户燃气工程设计的一些经验。

sentences.english: Nanning City in a certain market share.
sentences.chinese: 在南宁市有一定的市场份额。

sentences.english: SPARKLE Moonlight Yorkshire stems in Nanning City in Guangxi Province.
sentences.chinese: 旌宇月光约克夏梗设在广西省南宁市。
